COM.sootNsmoke.scheme
Class SchemeLibrary

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--COM.sootNsmoke.scheme.SchemeLibrary
public class SchemeLibrary
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains an initalizer for the Scheme binding environment, and defined in the Revised^4 Scheme specification. Those procedures defined as "essential" are generally defined using Java. Those defined as non-essential are usually written using Scheme, in the file "library.scm". (A few non-essential procedures are written in Java, either for performance reasons or just so that the author could switch languages for a bit.)

append

public static java.lang.Object append(java.lang.Object arg1,
                                      java.lang.Object arg2)
Appends list arg2 to the end of arg1. arg1 should be a list. Returns the head of the new list (which will be arg1 unless arg1 is null, in which case it's arg2.)

apply

public static java.lang.Object apply(java.lang.Object proc,
                                     java.lang.Object args)
Apply procedure proc to the args. proc is a CompiledProcedure. args is a Cons list of arguments

spliceVector

public static void spliceVector(java.util.Vector v,
                                java.lang.Object o)
Splices the object o into the vector v. If o is a Cons list, each car of the list is added to v. If o is an array, then the elements tacked on to the end of the vector. Otherwise, the results are undefined.

length

public static int length(java.lang.Object l)
Returns the length of a list.

Converts a long to an Integer or Long, as appropriate

compare

public static int compare(java.lang.Object s1,
                          java.lang.Object s2,
                          boolean ignoreCase)
Compares two mutable or immutable strings. Returns <0 if s10 of s1>s2.
